review.title: “A great experience that I'd recommend to anyone.”
review.pros: Pros – This was a great environment to work in. I learned a lot of skills and had a lot of variety in my job. The staff are super friendly and make working there an amazing experience
review.cons: Cons – Company's first experience in the food industry. Owned by ACR Homes, there were a lot of different opinions as to how to run a coffee shop. Given that it was a privately owned coffee shop, there isn't much room for growth.
